kvs.subtitle: Open and transparent decentralized autonomous organizations
kvs.subdecription: All FAIR token holders can participate in governance, jointly build the DeFi ecosystem, promote the sustainable development of FAIR DAO, and benefit all ecological participants
kvs.page-description-opensource: We have opened up most of the code. If you have free time, you can join us to promote the development of FAIR DAO together.
kvs.dao-1-des: The FAIR DAO protocol is managed by a decentralized global community, where all FAIR token holders, developers, and ecosystem participants can provide ideas and opinions on community governance.
kvs.dao-2-des: Ecological participants obtain credit through donations, build fair applications, and jointly create a prosperous ecosystem.
kvs.dao-3-des: Fair token holders can not only enjoy the ecological rights of FAIR DAO, but also fully participate in DeFi& The ecosystem of CeFi.
kvs.dao-4: Transparent on chain, secure and efficient
kvs.dao-4-des: All votes of FAIR DAO are generated on the chain and cannot be tampered with by anyone. To ensure the fairness, efficiency, and transparency of governance.

open-items.name: Fair framework
open-items.des: A scalable client application development framework, primarily in C #; Supports mainstream mobile, PC, and web browsers, with the app utilizing MAUI Blazor technology; The web end adopts Blzaor Webassembly technology.

open-items.name: Fair Wallet
open-items.des: A Web3 wallet plugin developed under the Fair Framework, currently supporting Wave Field Wallet and Ethereum Wallet

open-items.name: Fair DAO official website
open-items.des: The source code of the current website
